about_the_game:
Gear up to go bonkers in Elimination as you grab your friends for casual, arena-style free-for-all fun. Destroy your enemies and score points by using a variety of weapons and boobytraps across multiple stages in this cartoon-stylized game.



If you like what you see, please let me know by adding this to your wishlist. It will tremendously help me in understanding the demand as how to prioritize this project.

Multiplayer Modes

He or She who defeats the most players wins the round. Don't like free-for-all? Other game modes allow the fun to continue, such as Freeze Tag, where one player is the attacker with a freeze gun and other players can unfreeze to score points. Or how about Package Pirates, a game mode about stealing others' packages scattered across the map in a race against time with other players and dropping them off at your designated drop-off point?

name: Elimination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Elimination is an online, multiplayer, competitive action platform game. Use all sorts of cartoon weapons at your disposal to help you along the way in this fast-paced, arena-style online game. Just remember, the only way to victory is through elimination.
